item.title: About
item.description:
Greetingsï¼Welcome to get some information about me

This interface is translated from Google Translate, there may be differences with the Chinese version, please refer to the Chinese version.

âœ¨Basic information

  • Gender: Female ğŸ‘§
  • Age: Born in 11111010001
  • Undergraduate education experienceğŸ“:
    • 2019.9.1~2020.7.06 China University of Geosciences (Wuhan) English Major, School of Foreign Languages
    • 2020.9.1~present China University of Geosciences (Wuhan) School of Automation third-year student majoring in automation
  • HometownğŸ : Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, China

âœ¨Introduction

**In short: an ordinary but not ordinary ğŸŒ person. ** I am currently in and will be in a state where I am content with the ordinary, but I am happy to be unique ğŸ™ˆ.

ğŸ’– Favorites

Since I have been receiving all kinds of information since I was a child, I have a variety of hobbies as a three-minute hot person, but because of this, I can’t decide what I like the most ğŸ¤”. Some things that interest me at the moment include but are not limited to the following:

  • All kinds of hand-made ğŸ™‡ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸:clay, painting, Lego (Because of lazyness, each production cycle is very long ğŸ¤«)
  • Variety of games ğŸ®:
    • Online games: CSGO, UNO, Garry’s mod (unfortunately, there are always bugs when loading community subscriptions now), Battle Block Theater (the game that took me into the pit of steam), Portal series, Sea of â€‹â€‹Thieves, It Takes Two;
    • Single player games: Red Dead Redemption 2ğŸŒ˜, Life is StrangeğŸŒ•, There is no gameğŸŒ•, Cities Skyline, Prison Architect;
    • Some games with plots I like very much, but difficult to advance because of handicap or cowardice: Witcher 3, Metro 2033, Payday2, Bioshock all series;
  • Exercise: âš¾ï¸ğŸ“ğŸ¸âš½ï¸ğŸ¹ (represents preference but not mastery)
  • Books: Xu Sanguan Selling Blood, The Seventh Day, Animal Farm, Journey to the Center of the Earth, Breath, Ghost Blowing the Lamp.
  • movies:
    • TV series: Lucky Star, River God, Ghost Blowing Lantern, Gravity Fall, Adventure Time, I Love You (Korean), One Liter of Tears (Japanese)
    • Movies: Spider Man (all versions except Marvel version), all animated movies of Disney & Pixar, and Illumination (with fairy tales but also reflecting reality, allowing people to dream without being too addicted to dreams), Wonder Boy, Happy Movies from Twist (Happiness is over), Parasite, Your name, all the big Lego movies (Batman and Joker in the lego movie are really really cute!) and so on, it’s just too much ~

ğŸ’” Hate

Although I can’t choose what I like the most, I can easily list the most hated things in life:(

  • ğŸš«The attack of onion, ginger and garlic
  • ğŸš« Stay alone in a crowded space
  • ğŸš« Fake person or thing
  • ğŸš« Hypocritical people
